it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapons

Class WeaponController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapons.WeaponController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlternativeEffectWeaponController, OptionalEffectWeaponController, OrderedEffectsWeaponController, SimpleWeaponController

    public abstract class WeaponController
extends java.lang.Object
    WeaponController is an abstract class with a template "fire" method and non implemented findTargets and shootTargets

        public void fire(Player player,
                 PlayerViewOnServer client)
          throws UserTimeoutException
        Create a list of valid targets, choose targets and shoot them.
        Parameters:
        client - the client who is firing the weapon
        player - the player who is firing the weapon
        Throws:
        UserTimeoutException - if the user takes too long to respond or disconnects

        Returns:
